alert.note: Alert for Allegany; Cattaraugus; Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 26 at 8:26PM EDT by NWS Buffalo
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT WYOMING...CATTARAUGUS...EASTERN ERIE...NIAGARA...ORLEANS...WESTERN ALLEGANY AND GENESEE COUNTIES THROUGH 915 PM EDT... At 824 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Fort Niagara State Park to near Lancaster to 8 miles southwest of Allegany State Park. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Cheektowaga, West Seneca, Clarence, Lockport, Batavia, Depew, Amherst, Olean, Lancaster, East Aurora, Medina, Albion, Salamanca, Williamsville, Hamlin Beach State Park, Allegany State Park, Darien Lakes State Park, Letchworth State Park, Elma, and Newfane. This includes the following highways... Interstate 90 between exits 47 and 49. Interstate 86 between exits 17 and 29. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Allegany; Cattaraugus; Genesee; Niagara; Northern Erie; Orleans; Southern Erie; Wyoming
